segments.text: What a beautiful view , my sweetheart !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It sure is.The Grand Canyon is truly masterpiece . No man could ever make anything like this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It is the Colorado River . You will go down the river in a boat if you wish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you.It looks a bit too dangerous for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is a beautiful state park here . I can see why so many people come out here to camp .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , there is this beautiful view . you may go fishing , camping and also enjoy this beautiful clean air .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It definitely is a nice change from the polluted and crowded city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are so romantic , my sweetheart .
segments.speaker: S1
